about_the_game:
Once, the world was protected by dragons and dragon knights, but now the dragons are all gone, the world is being corrupted by evil creatures When the sun fades, they are born from cracks, destroying and devouring everything. And you, a human archer, your home has become a ruin, you have to embark on a wandering lost. Just when you thought everything was meaningless, you accidentally found a dying baby dragon, you successfully rescued it and decided to raise it up. Since then, you've adventured together, hunted together, played together, and ultimately became each other's closest combat partners. As you grow, the dragon grows, and the team grows, you begin to rekindle hope...

This is an adventure tower defense game, which also includes other gameplay elements, please refer to the following features for details.

Features:
  • Adventure Survival: Explore the world map and survive. Face different enemies, fight or flee. Teleport in different worlds.

  • Hire and Summon Dwarf Mercenaries: Hire and summon different dwarves to fight for you. Dwarves are divided into various types. Different types of dwarves have different attack characteristics and growth attributes.

  • Construction and Tower Defense: Build or repair various defenses of your base. When night falls, guard your base.

  • Pet development: Accompany the growth of the baby dragon, feed the baby dragon, and fight with it. When the dragon grows, it can be mounted and controlled to spray dragon flames.

  • Built-in mini-games: There are three built-in mini-games, you can play with the dragon.

  • The game system is combined with the day and night weather system. The weather system affects some game decisions.

  • The combat system is based on dodge and bow skills.

  • Hunt & Collect: Hunt all kinds of animals. Enhance and upgrade with a variety of different collection elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4330, AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960 4GB or AMD 380X 4GB or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX2060 8GB or AMD 5700 8GB or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Hunt animals, slay monsters, recruit dwarves, organize defenses, and adventure with your dragon in this crumbling land. Guard your base before being swallowed by evil creatures and find a way to teleport to a new world.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
